title: Over half (51%) of Americans trust user-generated content more than other information on a company website...

attachments.displayName:
Over half (51%) of Americans trust user-generated content more than other information on a company website (16%) or news articles about the company (14%) when looking for information about a brand, product, or service

UGC is so powerful. How are you using it? I would love to learn a new way to leverage this powerful content for your business

Read more about why your brand need UGC
http://blog.filemobile.com/benefits-user-generated-content/ #UGC #usergeneratedcontent #contentmarketing

object.content:
Over half (51%) of Americans trust user-generated content more than other information on a company website (16%) or news articles about the company (14%) when looking for information about a brand, product, or service

UGC is so powerful. How are you using it? I would love to learn a new way to leverage this powerful content for your business
